imdb.plot outline: "Diva at the Beauty Salon" is the pilot episode to a TV sitcom titled "Diva at the..." The series was created by SAG actress, and pop-rock adult contemporary artist, Marneen Lynne Fields who's also a scriptwriter. Marneen came up with the idea to share weekly stories about her career as a professional actress (1976 to present), and a Hollywood stunt woman and stunt actress from (1976 to 1991). Each episode of "Diva at the..." will see Marneen face a bitter-sweet, half fictional, comedic challenge in her career.
imdb.title: Diva at the Beauty Salon
akas: Diva at the Beauty Salon (United States)
plot: "_Diva at the Beauty Salon_ (qv)" is the pilot episode to a TV sitcom titled "Diva at the..." The series was created by SAG actress, and pop-rock adult contemporary artist, Marneen Lynne Fields who's also a scriptwriter. Marneen came up with the idea to share weekly stories about her career as a professional actress (1976 to present), and a Hollywood stunt woman and stunt actress from (1976 to 1991). Each episode of "Diva at the..." will see Marneen face a bitter-sweet, half fictional, comedic challenge in her career.::Marneen Lynne Fields

When Diva makes her entrance, the whole room stops to look, waiting with baited and uncertain breath for what she may say or do next. Whether she is sitting under the dryer at the salon, enjoying a meal at a fancy steak house or bowling for strikes at the local alley, Diva's natural wit and unique take on life engages, entertains and frequently mystifies friends and strangers alike. Based in part on the true-life adventures of singer, actress and one-time Hollywood stunt woman Marneen Fields, Diva brings an hilarious and truly one-of-a-kind perspective to the cult of celebrity.::John Harrison
